title: Reminiscences of Yarrow. Edited and annotated by ... Professor Veitch, LL.D. Illustrated by Tom Scott ... Second edition
author: Russell, James
snippet: Numbersof the parishioners, especially in and around Ettrickbridge, have reached or overpassed the four-scoreyears and ten, of whom it might be said "the eyehad not waxed dim, nor the natural force abated."

title: Reminiscences of Yarrow. Edited and annotated by ... Professor Veitch, LL.D. Illustrated by Tom Scott ... Second edition
author: Russell, James
snippet: Up to acomparatively recent period there were no bridgesacross the rivers, save at Deuchar and Ettrickbridge.
